title: VCE Legal studies
creator_credit: Swinburne Institute of Technology. Film and Television School and Victorian Curriculum and Assessment Board
brief_description: A panel discussion between the chief examiners for Legal Studies, a current teacher of Legal Studies and a current Year 12 student of Legal Studies. Hosted by Garry Pearson.
